text: Andrea Mátay (born 27 September 1955 in Budapest) is a retired Hungarian high jumper. Her outdoor personal best jump was 1.94 metres, achieved in September 1979 in Mexico City.World women's all-time best high jump (last updated 2001 She had 1.98 m on the indoor track, from February 1979 in Budapest. It was a world indoor record. She won two medals at the European Indoor Championships. She became Hungarian champion in 1973, 1975, 1977, 1978, 1979 and 1985.Hungarian Championships - GBR Athletics She was named Hungarian Sportswoman of The Year in 1979 after having won the European Indoor Championships and the Summer Universiade the same year. ==International competitions== {| |- !colspan="6"|Representing |- |rowspan=2|1973 |European Indoor Championships |Rotterdam, Netherlands |5th |High jump |1.84 m |- |European Junior Championships |Duisburg, West Germany |4th |High jump |1.78 m |- |1976 |Olympic Games |Montreal, Canada |9th |High jump |1.87 m |- |rowspan=2|1977 |European Indoor Championships |San Sebastián, Spain |4th |High jump |1.86 m |- |Universiade |Sofia, Bulgaria |4th |High jump |1.84 m |- |rowspan=2|1978 |European Indoor Championships |Milan, Italy |4th |High jump |1.88 m |- |European Championships |Prague, Czechoslovakia |6th |High jump |1.85 m |- |rowspan=2|1979 |European Indoor Championships |Vienna, Austria |bgcolor="gold" | 1st |High jump |1.79 m |- |Universiade |Mexico City, Mexico |bgcolor="gold" | 1st |High jump |1.94 m |- |rowspan=2|1980 |European Indoor Championships |Sindelfingen, West Germany |bgcolor="silver" | 2nd |High jump |1.93 m |- |Olympic Games |Moscow, Soviet Union |10th |High jump |1.85 m |- |1981 |Universiade |Bucharest, Romania |9th |High jump |1.88 m |- |1985 |European Indoor Championships |Athens, Greece |6th |High jump |1.85 m |- |1988 |European Indoor Championships |Budapest, Hungary |7th |High jump |1.88 m |} ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1955 births Category:Living people Category:Hungarian female high jumpers Category:Sportspeople from Budapest Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 1976 Summer Olympics Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 1980 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic athletes of Hungary Category:Universiade medalists in athletics (track and field) Category:Universiade gold medalists for Hungary Category:Medalists at the 1979 Summer Universiade
title: Andrea Mátay
